Description: EPA Region 7 has reached a consent agreement with FMC Corporation of Philadelphia, Pa., to resolve allegations that it improperly advertised its Capture LFR Insecticide with five Nebraska radio stations and a regional radio network in December 2012, in violation of the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act (FIFRA).
Info Source: https://archive.epa.gov/epapages/newsroom_archive/newsreleases/6b9c4bdecc938f3685257d330071bc68.html

Private Litigation Case Title: Rogers, et al v. FMC Corp

Info Source: https://www.cdpr.ca.gov/docs/mill/actions/fines.htm
